directions: In a 9x9 inch baking dish combine rice, soup and broth.
Cut butter into slices and place on top of the mixture.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
Remove cover and bake 30 minutes more.
ingredients: 1 (10 oz) can of Condensed French Onion Soup
